alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 3:41PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Hancock and south central Pearl River Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 341 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Picayune, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Picayune and Stennis Space Center. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 59 in Louisiana between mile markers 10 and 11. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
